404.description: Unfortunately, the requested resource does not exist or is under development

teamselector.status_400: Please select heroes and team stats.

landing.h3: Find out the outcome of pro dota 2 matches.
landing.p: Dotaverse is a free web service for predicting Dota 2 pro match results based on open stats.

features.p: Find out the outcome of a professional dota 2 match using a service backed by mathematical expectation and open player statistics.

items.title: Regular Data Updates
items.description: The data is automatically updated every 30 minutes. This includes updates on current heroes, pro players and teams.

items.title: Open Free API
items.description: The Dotaverse open API allows you to send up to 45 requests per minute. There are NO restrictions on the number of requests per day.

items.title: Prompt Response Time to Incoming Requests
items.description: The service provides fast request processing with low caching time, which helps to keep the requested resources up-to-date.

predict-match.p: Select professional teams and corresponding characters from the list, and our service will draw a winner from the pair.
